name: CarbonBright
description: CarbonBright is an AI-driven platform transforming sustainability in the CPG industry. We automate and scale product-level Life Cycle Assessments (LCAs), addressing Scope 3 emissions by leveraging generative AI, making product sustainability measurable and actionable at scale.
